description:
Saintess Aristella, who sealed the goddess of lust to her body from the imprisonment in the temple of Wigmentar, could not escape forever.

She sometimes felt hot and her consciousness flew away.

The priests and knights in the temple, were seduced by the power of the goddess inside her, which gets stronger as the days go by.

“I don’t like relationships without love!”

The tearful war of others begins to occupy the innocent Aristella!>
